name: Menu

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the filed.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: description
properties3.example: Choose which menu should be rendered with this instance of module.

properties5.name: default
properties5.description: (optional) is the default menu. Note that this is the name of the menu shown in the Type column on the Menu Manager screen and not the menu ID number.

properties6.name: showon
properties6.description: (optional) Allows you to hide the field based on the value(s) of another field; for Joomla 3.2.4+ https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The menu form field type provides a drop down list of the available menus from your Joomla! site. If the field has a saved value this is selected when the page is first loaded. If not, the default value (if any) is selected.
